STOP.no_session_desc: No active voice translation session found.
STOP.permission_denied_desc: Only the user who started the session (<@{original_user}>) or server admins can stop it.

STOP.error_stopping_desc:

STOP.auto_translate_stopped_desc: Auto-translation has been disabled for this channel.
STOP.footer_both_stopped: üí° Use /voicechat or /autotranslate to start new sessions ‚Ä¢ /daily for points
STOP.footer_auto_stopped: üí° Use /autotranslate to re-enable auto-translation ‚Ä¢ /daily for points
